website_summaries.verdict: Three pairs of classic knee socks for a decent price. Comfortable for most, but may not provide the best fit for everyone.
pros: Made of a cotton-blend material that provides a warm yet breathable fit as well as excellent moisture wicking
Elasticity keeps them up throughout the day
cons: Only available in one size, and the top is too tight for some wearers
Prone to developing holes around the toes

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd be excited about socks, but here we are.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 5.5" tall with size 8 feet and weigh between 120 and 140 pounds (depending upon the availability of chocolate peppermint bark) and these socks go all the way up to my knees and just... stay there. The fabric is smooth with plenty of give and take, and the elasticized part at the top isn't cutting off my circulation. If I could give these babies 10 stars, I'd cheat and give them 11. I hope your experience with these socks is this amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendina M. Ubaghs

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! It's hard to find socks with a high cotton content and the elasticity to keep them from falling around my ankles. They have a very flat seam at the toe for superior comfort. And they aren't flimsy like so many other knee socks. They wash well and don't shrink.
customer_reviews.author: bkd'a

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. My orthopedic Dr even commented how perfect they ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit my need perfectly . I broke my ankle in three places and am wearing a boot. I needed something soft and lightweight to wear inside the walking boot. These are perfect. My orthopedic Dr even commented how perfect they were. 👍👍 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Sandor

customer_reviews.title: Good material, painfully tight top band
customer_reviews.text: Good material and nice, long thin sock, but as you pull it up the leg, the band at the top is way too tight. Granted, I'm a larger gal, wearing XL and 18/20 size clothes, but I'm not HUGE and it frustrates me that I can't find business trouser socks that don't bind and leave painful marks by early afternoon. What do people larger than me wear? and where do they find their wardrobe basics?
customer_reviews.author: MNMom

customer_reviews.title: Buy these socks!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail in time for the present June temperature drop in MA! I am extremely pleased with them. It was so hard to find basic white knee socks anywhere. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: muffin54

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Stayed up all day long!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, soft fabric. They come to the middle of the knee. I wore them with booties and they stayed up all day long. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: z j p

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Being a woman police volunteer I purchased these socks for my uniform. They worked so good I ordered them again. They stay up and keep their shap after washing. I live in Florida... I wear them summer and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL for a small woman such as myself.  TIGHT at the top
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a womans size. I am 5 foot 2 , 100 pounds and these are sooo tight at the top, I can not wear them. I tried to get a refund directly from them but that was not possible I had to go thru too much thru amazon, so I decided to give a bad review to WARN you about the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Susie F

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks to create a young Hermione costume for Halloween and they exceeded my expectations. Usually tall socks tend to be really tight or they slip down but these ones fit comfortably and stayed in their place. I was really impressed with how soft and comfortable they are with also being practical. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stay as new months later.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Catholic, monastic sister who wears black knee high socks every day under my black tunic. I purchased three pairs of these socks to add to my current old pairs. I put them on 14-16 hours a day and found my KONY socks stay in good condition with frequent wear and wash. The top elastic that binds to the leg is still firm on all pairs and it does not leave grit mark on the skin nor irritates it. And the material remains soft on the skin (it doesn't generate those tiny balls of soft fabric fiber all over.) Good quality and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kum-Kum

customer_reviews.title: feel great on the feet and they stay up on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Luv these high quality socks, feel great on the feet and they stay up on the legs. Will be buying another set of three.
customer_reviews.author: SAE

customer_reviews.title: Not quite white
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit well and are comfortable but I ordered white and the ones I received are a very pale lilac. They won’t go with many of my clothes but I’m going to keep them because it is quite a pretty color and won’t show that much when wearing long pants.
customer_reviews.author: Carla W.

customer_reviews.title: Knee-high Socks for Comfort, Cling, and Perfect Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I am tall and these socks fit right up to my knee. And they stay put without cutting off the circulation. The high cotton content makes them comfortable. Even after several washings, they have not shrunk or lost their deep color. I will definitely be buying more. Hope they make them in other solid colors like navy blue and brown.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneL

customer_reviews.title: Best socks ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best socks I've ever had! They're not too thick or thin, super comfortable and they stay up all day. I will definitely buy more and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These socks were used for Teen Performers and kept their shape. They were worn for several performances. Definitely worth It!! I recommend buying these socks. We have worn many other brands, but not the quality of these socks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing reviews like this because I hate reading them from other people. But I bought these socks because I needed knee high ones for work. By the end of the first day, there were holes in both big toe spots. Then today I went to target and bought 6 pairs for 9 dollars. These are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect socks for a foot brace or boot
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear a foot brace. These are the perfect socks for a foot brace or boot. They also feel comfortable and are the right thickness. The socks are also the right length and don't roll down to expose your leg to be rubbed by the brace. Additionally, I like how they provide support for my injured ankle when I don't have to use the brace. I would definitely recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Handsome socks
customer_reviews.text: With a little stretch to them, they stay up well. Perfect weight to go inside boots or shoes without being too bulky. They are longer than I thought as they cover the knee. I'm 5'5'' and 135 lbs. You can fold them down if you want them below the knee without being too bulky. The weight is not too warm or cool. They are an all-year-round fabric. The feet are small. I take a 7.5 medium and they just fit. Bigger feet might have a tight go of it. But very nice socks. I haven't washed them yet... more on that later.
customer_reviews.author: T LeBaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Sock
customer_reviews.text: These fit with great compression but could be a little larger at the top. The material is so soft you don't even know you have them on. I have never seen these before on Amazon so that is one of the reason's I decided to try them as well as the great price. The company sent me a link to follow up but I have not as I do not know if it is through Amazon, or maybe I had not gotten to doing my reviews yet. Still all in all great product..
customer_reviews.author: S. Runyon

customer_reviews.title: These are great socks! I've bought them a couple of times ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks! I've bought them a couple of times now and will probably be buying them again. They launder well and don't "pill" up like other socks I've bought in the past. Thanks for the smooth transaction! Never a problem with an Amazon seller! 'Love your product!
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN OLEWINE

customer_reviews.title: Stays up ALL day with perfect comfort
customer_reviews.text: These socks stay up ALL day without leaving an indentation in my skin. They are so soft and delightfully comfortable. They wash and dry very well, without loss of elasticity. (DON'T use dryer sheets on any fabric with spandex/rubber/elasticity - it will kill the elasticity of the fabric). These are wonderful, high quality socks. I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! So Lucky to Have Found These Socks
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for great quality knee socks for years. I have wasted a lot of money in my search. Some would wear out in the heel after several wears. Others would wash terribly. Some were compression socks that I did not need or want. Then I found these. I listened to fellow Amazon shoppers giving these socks 5 stars and I agree. The quality of the sock is 5 star. The weight is perfect. The thick ess is perfect. 5 star rating is warranted.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5 1/2, medium size and wear a size 8.5 Women’s regular shoe. The S/M sock fit me perfectly with a comfortable snug fit. The socks are attractive and don’t squish my small bunion. The support is very mild and pleasant for days that require only moderate standing or else they would have gotten a 5 but if real support is what was needed then I would have given them a 3. They stood well to washing and overall I am enjoying them - they are good value. For long airplane rides I will invest in 20-30 mm pressure socks.
customer_reviews.author: ronald tuckman

customer_reviews.title: These knee high socks are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These knee high socks are very comfortable. I have had them for about two weeks now. They have been through the washer and drier a couple times now. They are soft and stay up all day. They do not strangle my calf at the top like other brands have. I will be buy more colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: DG's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Holes developed in the heels and toes after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sobers

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, knee high, stay up all day
customer_reviews.text: These socks are exactly what I was looking for, as they are just the right compression (light) and they go up to just below the knee and stay up all day! They seem to be of decent quality and are just the right weight (thin) to fit into the shoes I wear fall, winter and Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Hat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality socks - they don't fall down to your ankles after a day of wear!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Do not wear well at all
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these socks but unfortunately 3 of the 6 pair I bought got holes in the toes on the first wearing! The people who make knee socks for women need to realize that the toes and heels need to have some reinforcing. We don"t just were them to sit around in!
customer_reviews.author: curtis19

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I need to wear braces on both ankles that are about med-calf high. Usually wear regular crew socks however I have had a severe rash develope underneath both. Dr. recommend to try knee highs. I don't care for heavy socks. Usually knee highs are to heavy, thick, shrink after laundering. In addition I am a plus size women so getting ones to actually come up high enough can be difficult. These socks are come up to my knee, are light weight, soft, comfortable and do not loose their size or shape even after washing and drying. Prefect in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Schaad Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Toe Blow out first day of wearing. Toe nails are trimmed so no good reason for this other than cheap construction I must remember to stick with reinforced toe
customer_reviews.author: Janet229

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are what I was looking for. Cotton with good elastic so they do not sag. They are thin for warm weather. The seam in the toe is evident but not too bad that it rubs on my toes. I like the variety of colors in the short socks. I am sun sensitive so often have to wear leggings or pants in the summer. The variety of socks are fun as accents and mean that I can wear sandals which are cooler.
customer_reviews.author: denmother

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly and Stay Up!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knee socks! They are lighter weight, so they don't stretch my shoes out too much and they stay up - even after washing and drying! I've purchased 2 sets of 3 pairs and am going to add one more set to my cart. To keep it simple, I buy all black with these so that they're quick and easy to match up out of the dryer (laundry is NOT my favorite thing).
customer_reviews.author: K. Driehorst

customer_reviews.title: an actual knee-high
customer_reviews.text: these are plenty long (I'm tall) they really come up to the knee. They are super comfortable and they stay up on my chicken legs. I bought 3-packs black and will now get the gray. I washed them - NO pill, no shrink, no static. These are now my "go-tos". Love them.
customer_reviews.author: cancerian719

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have large calves so I usually have a problem with socks being too constricting. I got these because other reviews said how well they fit. They stretch easily to go on but don't fall down while wearing them. Having been sorely disappointed with other sock purchases I was very happy that these lived up to the claims. They are a medium thickness which is what I wanted. Can wear them with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best socks ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these socks many times In different colors and they are the best socks ever! They are nice and long and stay up perfectly—never slip down—but are comfortable and not at all binding at the top. They are also very durable. I wouldn’t even consider another brand at this point! The ONLY thing I wish were different is that the navy and black colors are so close that I have to have bright sunlight to tell them apart, but I’ve noticed this has become a problem with navy in general. But other than that, that socks are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate it when a product lives up to it's description. In the case of these knee high socks, they exceeded my expectations. They are comfortable, cozy and warm. I recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette E. Levellie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are nice quality for the price. They look good and are warm, but not TOO warm. They seem to be holding their color well after washing, even though they are cotton. The size was slightly big for me, but as a 20 year paraplegic, I have very skinny calves. They probably would be perfect for the average person. I plan to purchase more in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Pushgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: These are thin cotton socks - not like "trouser socks" or sheer nylon knee highs. They are cotton, but hold their shape very well. I've had no problems with them not staying up, yet they are not so tight they leave a mark. The stripe is cute - it just makes them more fun. There is no noticeable change after several washings. If you are looking for a thin sock - they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great knee socks. Fit is great and very comfortable and they don’t slip down!!! Am so happy I could get in Navy Blue & they are the true dark Navy which is very hard to find. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: luvmyshihtzus

customer_reviews.title: The winner - for tall women who love cotton socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought 7 different kinds of natural fiber knee socks before deciding these were my favorite (so I bought a second package of these!) These are Soft, Warm but not too thick, Go all the way Up to my Knee, Stay up there 90% of the time withOUT leaving binding marks on my calves, are Easy to pull back up when they do slide down a fraction of an inch, and maintain their smooth finish after many washings (they don't pill). I am 5' 9" tall, 180 lbs. I wear dresses all the time, so wear knee socks every day all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good material, okay fit
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. They are thin enough that I don't overheat or get sweaty, but thick enough that they won't just rip/tear after a few wears. The only issue I had was the band at the top is not made to stretch very far, and is tight on my calves (which are a little larger than normal). If knee high boots generally don't fit your calves, these socks won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great socks that don't slide to your ankles
customer_reviews.text: I've had a hard time finding knee-high socks in general, and those I've found either don't reach the knee or don't stay up (either the elastic wears out too quickly or the weave is so tight the socks won't fit over the calf). These KONY socks are the perfect mix of stretchiness and support that stay in place all day, regardless of how much walking you do. The dark navy blue color does not fade, and the fabric is smooth and comfortable, it doesn't "pill" in the wash. I'd buy these again (and probably will).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Wash Well
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write my review because I wanted to wash and wear the knee high socks a few times. Well I have and I have two things to say. They fit well. Some knee socks are too tight or some inch their way down after awhile. These fit just right (I am 5'2" tall and weigh 166 pounds). Also they wash perfectly. I do not put them in the dryer. What more could you want.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy F.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SOCKS I'VE EVER OWNED!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite socks EVER!!!!!! They are so soft and comfortable. But that's not the best part. THEY STAY UP without being tight and uncomfortable. I don't even know I'm wearing them except for the warmth they provide. I keep my house cool in the winter and they keep me perfectly comfortable and warm. And I NEVER have to tug on them because they've slid down to my ankles! Thanks so much for a wonderful product. I can't recommend them highly enough. If there was a sixth star I would have chosen it! I'm a happy camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I like that they stayed up and didn’t slip. They faded in a cold water delicate cycle. After one wash hasn’t pilled. Only would be nicer to have a higher the cotton content in the footbed as I find they didn’t breathe as much as one would expect with a cotton content. Something is off there.
customer_reviews.author: baty

customer_reviews.title: NOT Cotton, shiny, too tight, snag-prone, lint magnet, pill-prone tubes.
customer_reviews.text: For very large feet, and ultra-skinny legs. I need cotton socks. These are advertised as Cotton. They are not Cotton. Shiny, too-tight, snag-prone, pill-prone lint attracting tubes. Olive Oil would wear these, if she didn’t mind having lint balls all over her legs. As you try to pull them up your calves...there is a static-electricity storm .... yikes!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Nice but get holes easily
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these 5 stars. I loved them so much after receiving them that I ordered another 3 pk set right away. Only to have sock after sock after sock get holes in the toes. Note: I keep my toenails trimmed. From 6 pairs of sock, I now have just 2 pairs left. They are comfortable, stay up, wash well but need a bit thicker fabric in the toes. I love them so much, I've kept the ones with holes thinking I might try to learn how to darn socks and repair them myself.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyCarol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Socks for Dress Pants
customer_reviews.text: I usually have so many issues with socks that go up to my knees. Usually they give me a rash due to the material or due to them being too tight. The KONY socks are perfect. They stay up, never fall down. Comfortable, does not give me a rash at all where they hold up. Buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Clarita Mom

customer_reviews.title: She told us that these socks are very comfortable, stay pulled up
customer_reviews.text: We bought these socks for our daughter who is an Orthodox Christian nun. They wear long black socks as part of their daily attire. She told us that these socks are very comfortable, stay pulled up, and are long-lasting. She likes them very much. These are the 2nd batch that we have purchased for her, the last ones were for her birthday last year. I'm sure that we will continue keeping her supplied with these KONY socks. An excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice knee high socks that actually fit like knee highs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these socks for my daughter as part of her school uniform. Good quality socks! I have washed them multiple times since the school year began and the socks still look new.
customer_reviews.author: nanistarr

customer_reviews.title: Coming back to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly solid quality, kept my feet dry and comfortable during the day, and surprisingly cozy at night. Do not hesitate, excellent for career outfits or casually on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dee

customer_reviews.title: These socks are super comfortable and stay up!
customer_reviews.text: I like them because they work great under my tall boots. They are really soft and stay up on your leg. I haven't been able to find knee socks in years! The only reason I did not give them a 5 star is because I got a hole after wearing them a couple of times. I would suggest making sure that your nails are clipped and filed; they are not reinforced at the toe. Do this and you will love the socks!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Berk

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: I needed socks to be worn under narrow fitting trousers and these were ideal. The fit was excellent - snug but not too restrictive. Often knee high socks are sized smaller than pictured but these were fine. I would not hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwibird

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some cotton knee high socks to replace the ones I have had for years. These are the perfect replacement! They are soft, pull on with ease, don't cutoff circulation, and wash very well. There is no shrinkage and they retain their shape. I think there's a little Lycra woven in, but the content is mostly cotton. I expect to have these a long time as well. I'm considering buying a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Torri A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Comfort Socks
customer_reviews.text: These are the best knee-high socks I have ever had. The are so good that I ordered six more pairs the day I got the initial order of three pairs. They are long enough, comfortable, and soft and warm. They stay up! They are super easy to put on. I’ll never wear another pair of socks. These are perfect. I would give them 10 stars I’d I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Looks like keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This is a new product for me. I wore it once before. Today is the second time. So far I like these trouser socks because of the fabric--cotton. I'm in the process of returning another set of socks purchased at the same time and worn yesterday. This one lycra/spandex/nylon. When you touch it it feels great, so silky against the skin but on my feet, inside a shoe, it's not so pleasantI felt as though my feet were sliding around inside the shoe, whereas the cotton socks provide a stable feeling. I think I will be buying these socks going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boots...and Look Great too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancee because she needed some longer socks for work. She works as an EMT and shes getting certified in fire...so she wears boots everyday. (I also find them extremely attractive...so it was a win-win situation haha!) She loves the socks, they're well made and durable...and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Blazer

customer_reviews.title: Best socks ever
customer_reviews.text: When the socks arrived I was a little concerned because they were thinner than I had hoped. It's been very cold this winter with tons of snow and I wanted socks that would keep my feet warm. Then I wore them. Wow! They keep my feet warmer than other thicker socks. They also stay put - no sliding down my leg at all. They are my new favorite socks and I'm always sad when I go to my drawer for socks and find that these socks are all in the laundry. Therefore. I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Conn

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Happy I found and ordered - i've been needing some trouser socks (just below the knee socks) for a while for work and they work great. Not too thick or thin - and now that some chilly weather has kicked in in sunny So Cal they work perfect. they will even look cute with boots if i wear a dress.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha I

customer_reviews.title: These socks are very comfortable. They do not feel "binding" after several hours ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable. They do not feel "binding" after several hours of wear. I wore it in the Amazon forest. They did not feel hot or "binding." I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandtrvlr

customer_reviews.title: Great sock - Great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. These socks are extremely comfortable and well made. They fit perfectly with enough stretch to stay up all day but they are never too tight. They are the perfect thickness. They are heavy enough to be worn with sneakers but thin enough to be worn with a dressier shoe like a trouser sock. For me that is an an outstanding quality. I purchased them in three different colors and I am glad I did. I only wish they came in more colors. I would highly recommend these socks. They are an exceptional product at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lange

customer_reviews.title: Love 'Em
customer_reviews.text: Goes to just under my knee; perfect for me as that part of my legs are always cold. Socks keep my feet and legs nice and cozy and - most importantly for me - WARM. Very high quality. Looks and feels good. Came fast,Seller follows up and very professional. I am sure if there was any issue they would respond. I have no complaints. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! The fit is perfect, not too tight and not too loose. The socks don't collect lint and wash beautifully. They are comfortable and cosy. I will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: apcalc

customer_reviews.title: These are true knee-highs! Stay up really well!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, nice dark black color. Good quality, not cheap at all. They go all the way to my knee, which is nice because I’ve tried some that weren’t quite long enough from the store. They stay up all day and don’t sag or get baggy. They wash well. Will probably get more because I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Teague

customer_reviews.title: Something changed?
customer_reviews.text: Just re-ordered a pack of white socks and the socks feel terribly stiff, not soft at all. The materials say 84% cotton, 11% polyester and 5% polyurethane. I'm wondering if the material has changed? I had bought several packs of these socks (white and black with white stripes) over the last couple of years and they were fantastic & soft! Felt like almost pure cotton socks. I washed one pair to see if they would soften up. They do seem a bit better. If they hold up as well as ones I have purchased in the past, I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Heels wear through really fast
customer_reviews.text: Really thin material and the heel wore a hole in it in less than 4 wearings on all pairs. Really poor quality material. Better off looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: GEH

customer_reviews.title: Finally - knee socks that stay up and retain their shape.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully soft and fit perfectly. They retain their shape through normal washing. The elastic isn't too tight. These stay up all day under my dress pants. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kinney, T

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for knee socks for over a year. I live in Maine and the winters are cold, so I wear knee socks as trouser socks to keep my feet warm at work. I couldn't find good knee socks in regular stores, so I ordered these and I love them. They aren't so thick that they will stretch out my dress shoes, but they are thick enough to be warm. They also have a great amount of stretch to them which I love. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! The stretched enough to accommodate my wide calves but not so tight to cut off the circulation at the top. I bought these to wear with my work slacks because I don't want any leg skin showing when I sit - and these are at the perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice sock but not a true knee high.
customer_reviews.text: Not a true knee high. I am keeping them because they are a nice black color that looks good in my shoes. They are also thicker and warmer than a trouser sock. However, they are NOT knee highs. I consider a knee high to come above the calf and just below the knee. These come up mid to upper calf level. If you really want true knee highs keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted knee socks to block winter drafts on ankles, and these did the job nicely. They're soft and easy to wear. I'm short and had to roll the tops down an inch or so, but that worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Socks fit well with no seam puckers or bumpsI
customer_reviews.text: I like these socks very much. They are a lovely soft cotton blend, (mostly cotton), and are a tight knit so they should not be subject to holes. I have only had them for a short time so cannot comment on how well they they will wear, but they wash well (machine, cold water), and I do not force any problems. They go to the knee, and stay there for the whole day (no sliding or twisting). I bought the grey and am hoping they come in other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Look sleek, feel warm and tough enough for winter
customer_reviews.text: Feels warm like wool, looks thin enough to be trousers socks, and actually is smooth, tough cotton. They pull up easily and stay up. I’ve worn them throughout a very cold winter, and always felt — and looked — surprisingly sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Lutetia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Warm
customer_reviews.text: Found these socks to be nicer than similar ones from Land's End. They slide on easier. They are a little longer so I fold them down (I am short) but they stay up without leaving marks or feeling tight where the band is. I live in Wisconsin and am using these for very cold days. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Madelene Smith

customer_reviews.title: 5"ft Girls Be Aware!! SUPER SOFT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing but do be aware women who are 5" ft these socks are like thigh highs. I'm 5"ft myself and they go slightly above my knee which isnt a problem. Overall the socks are SO soft and the elasticity is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: matthew dupre

customer_reviews.title: Great service, perfect fit, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Consistency!!!!!!!!!!!! I have ordered many pairs of the same stock number of a major brand name sock. Each order brings differences in size, shape, color, and material. If one gets a hole in it, the good one can't be matched. After laundry is done, finding the mates to all these unmatched socks is a nightmare. I ordered six pairs of KONY and they ALL match. I've ordered 6 more pairs. Love, love the consistency, and that they are durable and comfortable as well. I wear this type of sock every day.
customer_reviews.author: BMorgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Denim-Friendly Socks For Fall and Winter
customer_reviews.text: I looked in several department stores for long navy blue socks that I could wear with my jeans in fall and winter, but couldn't find any. I was happy to find these. The color is a nice deep navy, they go all the way up to the knee, they are substantial enough to provide warmth and coverage without being too thick, and they have just enough stretch to stay in place and feel secure on your legs without being tight in any way. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These fit as my old knee high socks used to fit. the elastic band is a bit snug but not overly for me. I am 5'3" and most I turn the tops down to keep just below my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and gets holes easily
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these until I wore them twice. A hole in each pair already! Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Knee Highs
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture, the well-made socks themselves, the look and that there are high content of cotton. The only drawback for me is that they are a little tight after a day's wear. I try to stretch them to avoid indents. Perhaps I could check for the plus sizes. I am 5' 5" and 146 pounds. They are fine knee highs and I have bought them before this order. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cruz

customer_reviews.title: are easy to get on and offer just enough support
customer_reviews.text: My 93 yr old mother loves these socks...they fit well, are easy to get on and offer just enough support. I was thrilled to finally find knee socks for her that were comfortable. My disappointment came this morning when I saw a hole in one sock. Only had for a few weeks and already has a hole! These are not inexpensive and I would expect rhem to hold up much better!
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: these socks are fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter insisted in throwing all of her school socks away and to only wear Kony socks. they are so comfortable, and excellent quality. the fabric is soft and cozy on the foot and leg and they do not shrink in the wash and dryer. my daughter kept complaining about her other socks feeling tight and having holes and these Kony socks have replaced all of them and lasted through the whole school year. we just ordered even more for next year. Thank you Kony for making an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Aryeh Blum

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time looking for the perfect socks - and I think I’ve finally found them! They are actually long enough to go right up to my knee - nothing skimpy about them. They are very stretchy and easy to put on. After purchasing one pack of three and loving them, I immediately ordered two more packs of three.
customer_reviews.author: L. H. Zotis

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some black socks for myself several months ago and I have been wearing them all winter. They are not too thin but they are not very thick either. I will be ordering more. My Gold Toe socks which are thicker have developed holes on the bottom of the heels but my Kony socks are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SPENT A LOT OF MONEY ON STOCKINGS. BUT LIKE OTHER PEOPLE SAID THESE ARE OFF THE CHART. THEY ARE SO COOL AND SOFT, THEY ARE LIKE OPAQUE STOCKINGS THAT ACTUALLY STAY UP ON YOUR LEGS. DEFINITELY A MUST HAVE. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: knee high socks
customer_reviews.text: The knee highs were just the weight I was looking for. Comfortable and warm without being bulky. Fabric tight knit but stretchy. I am short and they actually went over the top of my knee rather than just up to the knee, which is what I wanted .However they roll easily since they are light weight and it is still easy to bend my knee in jeans when I wore them under skinny leg jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Sears

customer_reviews.title: Stay up, not too thick
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I wear them with calf-high boots that I couldn't wear before because my socks kept disappearing below the tops, and the leather hitting my leg as I walked drove me nuts. These stay up whether they are pulled all the way up or runched where you need them, and they are not thick enough to make my boots too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Milne

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: I like cozy, warm knee high socks to keep me toasty in cold Michigan weather. These Kony socks feel WONDERFUL! They are warm, comfortable, and have just the right amount of stretch so my legs don't feel strangled. I just received them, so the true test will be if the toes hold up and don't get holes in a month! Time will tell. For now, they look and feel like five star socks.
customer_reviews.author: NED

customer_reviews.title: Really good socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so comfortable. I will be buying more the next time I need socks BUT the quality of these makes me think it will be a while before I will need socks again. They seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Finally the right trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: I have searched high and low for a trouser sock that would stay up and not make an indention in my leg. I decided to only order 1 package to try but I have plans to order more. It's exactly what I have been looking for. Thank you so much Margaret W
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M Watts

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cotton knee socks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great knee socks. Medium weight cotton. Stay up all day. I bought black ones last year and they are still wearing well. I just bought again in espresso. They are very dark brown. I have to hold them next to black to tell the them apart. I wish they were more brown but the socks are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are very soft and well made and remain like new despite many washes. They reach right below the knee as indicated and are very comfy. I would purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. My daughter is in a private school and we usually purchase from flynn and ohara and their socks shrink badly. I was tired of purchasing from them soo I looked at reviews here for navy uniform socks and happy to say my daughter loves them. They keep her feet dry, cool and warm depending on the season.❤
customer_reviews.author: Josie Bonello

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good material.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fit as expected and easy to clean. I got the navy ones, they are much darker than I expected. They look black, but it’s not really important to me. But if someone is looking for something discernibly Navy blue these will barely look different from black.
customer_reviews.author: Hungry Dragon Yoga Mommy

customer_reviews.title: They Stay Up!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! So far, they're holding up very well, and there's none of that saggy-baggy stuff! They're less expensive than other brands I've tried, and they do the job much better, too. Will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Llamazon

customer_reviews.title: Good for short-term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent trip to Paris, where I expected cooler weather. I needed thin socks for the shoes I brought. They kept my feet comfortable but the elastic at the top wore out very quickly. I went on my trip with 6 pairs and came back with 4 - had to throw 2 away because they kept falling down. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Caron

customer_reviews.title: Makes Toes Hurt
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is in these socks, but my big toes would hurt after wearing these. I thought I was getting an infection in on toe, it caused a large bump beside my toenail. I soaked my feet in Epsom Salt and put lotion on, etc. Nothing helped except to stop wearing the socks. My toes cleared up as soon as I stopped wearing these socks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Graybill

customer_reviews.title: These excellent socks are soft
customer_reviews.text: These excellent socks are soft, not bulky but cozy. I have peripheral neuropathy in my feet and I am always looking for ways to make them more comfortable, These Kony socks are a blessing! Thank you very much for a fine product!
customer_reviews.author: L. Worthington

customer_reviews.title: These make me like socks. Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: By nature, I don't like socks. They make my feet/legs feel suffocated and as if the skin can't breathe. This does the complete opposite and I was pleasantly surprised! Finally, my legs/feet are warm but I don't feel as if I have to rip them off due to feeling constricted! LOL
customer_reviews.author: ldjsatx

customer_reviews.title: No complaints so far from my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these socks for my daughter's school uniform. In the past she has worn the socks issued by the school which were mostly polyester. Her feet sweat terribly with the predictably malodorous results and teasing from her peers. These socks are mostly cotton and while I would prefer they be 100% cotton, they have mostly alleviated the problems my daughter was having.
customer_reviews.author: JakeGittes

product_meta.title: KONY Women's Cotton Knee High Socks - Casual Solid & Triple Stripe Colors Fashion Socks 3 Pairs (Women’s Shoe Size 5-9)
product_meta.description:
KONY Women's Cotton Knee High Socks - Casual Solid & Triple Stripe Colors Fashion Socks - 3 Pairs

Features and Size:
√ High Quality Cotton Socks Made in Korea 84% combed cotton, 11% polyester, 5% polyurethane
√ FBA Shipment is Available on the item marked as (Fulfilled by Amazon)
√ One size fits : US women’s shoe size 5-9

Excellent Functions
√ COMFORTABLE & COMFY : Not too thick or too thin. Suitable for all seasons. These socks are made with highly stretchy soft cotton blend. The touch is soft and the fit is super-comfy
√ Design : Basic solid colors and triple stripe colors. comfortable stretch for all day wear.
These socks are designed to wear right below the knee for a casual look

Package Included:
3 Pairs Pack Women's High Quality Cotton Knee High Socks 100% Money Back Guarantee:
If you have any problem on your products, Please Contact us via Email in advance of claim on Amazon,
Then we will provide you with reasonable solution quickly to solve your problem.
feature_bullets: 〔Material〕: 84% cotton, 11% polyester, 5% polyurethane. Made in Korea
〔Design〕: Basic solid colors and triple stripe colors. comfortable stretch for all day wear. These socks are designed to wear right below the knee for a casual look

〔Quality〕: Premium cotton material provides excellent moisture management, and maximized breathability, providing a pleasant wear experience all day. Ideal for soccer, baseball, running, hiking, cycling, climbing, golf, yoga, any kind of exercise
〔Perfect Gift Idea〕: All season cotton socks are perfect for christmas, birthdays, mother's day, girlfriends, daughters or any kind of day.
〔Care & size〕: Machine wash, tumble dry low, No bleach. Women’s shoe size 5-9
